intro: Chamaedendron, commonly known as the Christmas tree or the holiday tree, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Myrtaceae. They are characterized by their dense, evergreen foliage and conical shape, which makes them popular as ornamental plants. Chamaedendron species typically have small, leathery leaves and produce fragrant flowers that bloom in spring.
